definitions.definition: a person who practices or studies law; an attorney or a counselor.
examples: attorney, counsel, counselor, legal practitioner, legal professional, legal adviser, member of the bar, litigator, advocate; Morebarrister, solicitor; informalambulance chaser, mouthpiece, legal eagle, legal beagle "all the lawyers are confident that the case will be dismissed"Morebarrister, solicitor; ambulance chaser, mouthpiece, legal eagle, legal beagle all the lawyers are confident that the case will be dismissed

definitions.definition: practice law; work as a lawyer.
examples: lawyering is a craft that takes a long time to become proficient at

definitions.definition: (of a lawyer) work on the legal aspects of (a contract, lawsuit, etc.).
examples: there is always a danger that the deal will be lawyered to death
